summary: Merethic Mod Pack used to feature only the \"Merethic Dagger\" But now is starting to expand to spells, armor, houses, and weapons
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/78236163@N07/6948231376/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7215/6948231376_09c25e5e67_c.jpg[/img][/url]
Merethic Mod Pack used to feature only the \"Merethic Dagger\" But now is starting to expand to spells, armor, houses, and weapons
If you want something specific modified, leave me a comment, and i\'ll start working on it.

NOTE: I am currently not working on this for a while. This is not a dead project just putting it on hold as i work out a whole new design because, i might change the way this mod looks and has so far. Example Maybe a whole new world that has a custom city. (that was my plan, so give me and time as i put it together)

[color=blue]V0.3 Video Now Up!![/color]
[youtube]6EnIuGp_XPA[/youtube]

[color=blue]Merethic\'s Change Log[/color]
Version 0.3
- Added Player House
- Added Teleport Map (not finished)
- Added Room with ingredient\'s (not finished)
- Added 2 mannequin\'s
- Added Merethic Vendor
- Added Teleport from Helgen Exit to Player House
- Added Enchanting Table and Alchemy Table
- Removed Chest at Helgen

V0.2
- Chest location fixed
- Changed Merethic Dagger (Stronger then before)
- Added 2 Merethic Spell\'s (Flames and Frostbite)
V0.1
- Chest added in Helgen Keep
- Added 2 Merethic Dagger\'s in chest
author: MerethicEra

files.name: Merethic Mod Pack V01
files.changelogHtml:
Added a chest in Helgen Keep
Two modded Daggers in chest (with increased damage and value)

files.name: Merethic Mod Pack V02
files.changelogHtml:
Chest location fixed
Changed Merethic Dagger (Stronger then before)
Added 2 Merethic Spell\'s (Flames and Frostbite)
